p.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(seller_id, category_id, title, description, price, condition_level, cover_image, status) VALUES(#{sellerId}, #{categoryId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{price}, #{conditionLevel}, #{coverImage}, 'AVAILABLE')
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{productId}
mapper.select: SELECT , COUNT(p.id) as recommendation_score FROM favorites f1 JOIN favorites f2 ON f1.user_id = f2.user_id AND f1.product_id != f2.product_id JOIN product p ON f2.product_id = p.id JOIN user u ON p.seller_id = u.id WHERE f1.product_id = #{productId} AND p.status = 'AVAILABLE' GROUP BY p.id ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC LIMIT #{limit}
